attributes.action: Waive postal charges for parcels up 2kg's to our troops in Iraq and Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is our belief that the British Government should waive postal charges of items up to 2kg's in weight for delivery via BFPO to troops on operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.
These young men and women put their life on the line daily in supposed duty for their country but their families have to pay post office charges to send out morale boosting parcels to their loved ones.
This is a disgrace from this government and it should do the honourable things by waiving such charges for troops in theatre.
